<h1> About the Computing Club Organizers </h1>

The Columbia Statcom Club was founded in 2021 by [Maddie Stoms](https://www.linkedin.com/in/madison-stoms-597155127/), [Charly Fowler](https://www.linkedin.com/in/charlotte-fowler-2a86b71a0/), Steven Lawrence, and [Muhire Kwizera](https://www.linkedin.com/in/muhire-honorine-kwizera-96253583/) with the help of faculty advisor [Cody Chiuzan](https://www.publichealth.columbia.edu/people/our-faculty/cc3780).
